exclude-dir gwm,.repo,qcom
match-d /(VIP|Test_Device|tools|usbupgrade|test_device|Integration|integration|QNX|qnx|android/vendor/(nobo|noch)|Android/lagvm_p/LINUX/android/vendor/(nobo|noch))/
include-lang Java,C/C++ Header,C,C++,Protocol Buffers,XML,Python,JSON,Rust,Bourne Shell,Markdown,make,CMake
csv
out output/vendor.csv
